title: Ask Steve, Jay-Z Library, Aretha Franklin, Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Ask Steve, Jay-Z Library, Aretha Franklin, Reality Update and more.
description:
It's a good Thursday and Big Dog is grateful and tells us why.  We Ask Steve questions for Spring and you need to hear his answers.  Jay-Z's music has made it to the national recording registry's archive.  Congrats to Sean Carter.  Aretha Franklin has a Detroit highway named after her.  Idris Elba will be a Coachella this year and Steve has a funny Idris story as well.  Sheryl Underwood as always gives us a piece of her mind and this time she goes presidential.  Miss Carla's Reality Update has Real Housewives of Atlanta and Love and Hip Hop New York Reunion part 2, plus more.  In Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about the importance of our dreams and why.  Have a great weekend!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
